conversations.description: User requests a valuation for 742 Evergreen Terrace and the AI fetches recent comps, then suggests an initial offer based on buyer budget.
Buyer asks for market trend analysis in zip 90210 for the past 6 months, and the AI highlights price appreciation and average days on market.
User provides their buyer ID, the AI pulls the buyer profile, matches it with a property, and drafts a customized offer letter with contingencies.
Seller inputs the asking price for their downtown condo; the AI computes a negotiation strategy and recommends a starting price for potential buyers.
User wants to counter a seller's offer of $485,000 on a home; the AI creates a counter‑offer letter with adjusted contingencies and a new closing date.
Agent asks for a side‑by‑side comparison of two properties in the same neighborhood; the AI pulls valuations and presents a pros‑and‑cons markdown table.
First‑time buyer asks for financing options; the AI checks the buyer's budget, suggests a feasible offer range, and includes a financing contingency in the draft.
User wants to email the drafted offer to their realtor; the AI formats the letter in markdown and sends it via the email_send tool.
Investor asks for a quick ROI estimate on a rental property; the AI fetches valuation, market rent data, and suggests an offer that meets their return target.
Buyer wants to know how a recent school district rating change affects property values in zip 77005; the AI runs market_trend_analysis and explains the impact.
User asks the AI to prepare a multi‑property offer bundle for three houses; the AI aggregates valuations and creates separate offer letters for each.
Seller requests guidance on whether to lower the listing price; the AI compares current market trend factor and recent comps, then advises a price adjustment.
User wants to schedule a closing date two weeks earlier than planned; the AI revises the offer letter with the new closing date and resends it.
Buyer asks the AI to remove the inspection contingency after a successful home inspection; the AI updates the offer letter accordingly.
Agent asks for a summary of buyer preferences for a specific zip code; the AI pulls buyer profiles and highlights common budget ranges and move‑in dates.
User wants to negotiate a seller’s request for a $5,000 repair credit; the AI drafts a counter‑offer that splits the credit while preserving the offer price.
Buyer asks for a price justification report to present to their lender; the AI compiles valuation data, market trends, and comparable sales into a PDF‑style markdown.
Seller receives a lowball offer and asks the AI to suggest a polite rejection email with a counter‑offer suggestion.
User wants to know the impact of a recent interest‑rate hike on their buying power; the AI recalculates the maximum affordable offer and updates the strategy.
Buyer asks the AI to include a home‑sale contingency because they need to sell their current house first; the AI adds it to the draft offer.
Agent wants to generate a market snapshot report for a client meeting; the AI runs market_trend_analysis for three zip codes and creates a markdown briefing.
User asks for advice on whether to offer above or below the listing price for a hot market; the AI uses market_trend_factor and buyer budget to advise.
Buyer wants to add a pet‑addendum clause to the purchase agreement; the AI updates the offer letter with the new contingency.
Seller receives multiple offers and asks the AI to rank them based on price, contingencies, and closing timeline.
User wants to know the average price‑per‑square‑foot for properties in zip 30303; the AI runs market_trend_analysis and reports the figure.
Buyer asks the AI to draft a courteous thank‑you email after a viewing, attaching the updated offer letter.
Agent wants to know the optimal time to submit an offer during the week; the AI references recent market activity patterns and suggests best timing.
Seller asks the AI to generate a response to a buyer’s request for a rent‑back period after closing.
User wants to negotiate a higher seller concession for closing costs; the AI prepares a revised offer letter reflecting the new concession.
Buyer asks for a side‑by‑side cost comparison of buying vs. renting in the same area; the AI pulls market data and presents a markdown table.
Agent requests a draft email to the listing agent summarizing the buyer’s offer and asking for a quick response.
User wants to add an escrow holdback for repairs after closing; the AI incorporates this contingency into the counter‑offer letter.
Seller asks the AI to draft a formal acceptance letter for an offer that meets their asking price.
Buyer wonders if they should increase their offer after seeing a second‑hand inspection report; the AI reevaluates the valuation and suggests a revised price.
Agent needs to know the average days on market for properties similar to a client’s target home; the AI runs market_trend_analysis and reports the statistic.
User asks the AI to generate a multi‑step negotiation plan, outlining initial offer, possible counter‑offers, and fallback positions.
Seller wants the AI to draft a polite decline to a buyer whose offer is far below market value.
Buyer wants to include a financing contingency that expires in 10 days; the AI updates the offer letter with that specific deadline.
Agent asks for a quick snapshot of how many properties sold above asking price in zip 10022 last month.
User wants to know the tax implications of buying a property at the proposed offer price; the AI provides a brief overview and suggests consulting a tax professional.
Buyer requests the AI to format the offer letter in HTML for a client portal; the AI converts markdown to HTML and sends via email.
Seller asks the AI to propose a price reduction schedule if the home does not sell within 30 days.
Buyer wants the AI to prioritize properties that are within a 15‑minute commute to their workplace; the AI filters listings and drafts offers for matches.
Agent asks the AI to draft a follow‑up email after a negotiation meeting, summarizing agreed points and next steps.
User wants to know the effect of a new school opening on property values in their desired neighborhood; the AI runs a localized market trend analysis.
Seller receives a buyer’s offer with a lower closing date than requested; the AI prepares a counter‑offer proposing a later date.
Buyer asks the AI to include a clause allowing for a post‑inspection price adjustment based on repair estimates.
Agent wants a concise one‑page market outlook for a client’s investment portfolio across three zip codes.
User asks the AI to automate sending weekly market trend summaries to a list of investor email addresses.
Seller wants to know whether to accept an all‑cash offer slightly below asking; the AI compares cash vs. financed offers using market data.
Buyer requests the AI to draft an offer that includes a seller‑paid home warranty as a contingency.
Agent asks the AI to generate a polite request for the seller to waive the appraisal contingency.
User wants to see a projection of how a 2% price increase would affect monthly mortgage payments; the AI calculates and updates the offer draft.
Seller asks the AI to write a thank‑you note to a buyer after a successful closing.
Buyer asks the AI to summarize the key differences between two competing offers they received on the same property.
